entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:16 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tasiujaq Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Humidity: 63 %

Dewpoint: -40.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
